rlu.sqltrainer.gui
Class SQLTrainerController

java.lang.Object
  rlu.sqltrainer.gui.SQLTrainerController

 class SQLTrainerController
extends java.lang.Object

This controller is responsible for the execution of those commands, which change the state of the application. It is also responsible for catching exceptions, coming up from below.

Author:
R. Lunde
